### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Mining Drill 1 at position(x=-17.0 y=-50.0)
Consists of a burner-mining-drill at position(x=-17.0 y=-50.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Mining Drill 2 at position(x=-15.0 y=-50.0)
Consists of a burner-mining-drill at position(x=-15.0 y=-50.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Furnace at position(x=-10.0 y=-49.0)
Consists of a stone-furnace at position(x=-10.0 y=-49.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Inserter 1 at position(x=-13.5 y=-50.5)
Consists of a burner-inserter at position(x=-13.5 y=-50.5) with status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 2 at position(x=-13.5 y=-48.5)
Consists of a burner-inserter at position(x=-13.5 y=-48.5) with status EntityStatus.WAITR_SING_FOOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 3 at position(x=-16.5 y=-46.5)
Consists of a burner-inserter at position(x=-16.5 y=-46.5) with status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Wooden Chest 1 at position(x=-16.5 y=-47.5)
Consists of a wooden-chest at position(x=-16.5 y=-47.5) with status EntityStatus.NORMAL.

### Wooden Chest 2 at position(x=-9.5 y=-47.5)
Consists of a wooden-chest at position(x=-9.5 y=-47.5) with status EntityStatus.NORMAL.

### Belt Group 1 at position(x=-16.5 y=-51.5)
Consists of a belt-group at position(x=-16.5 y=-51.5) with status EntityStatus.EMPTY.

### Belt Group 2 at position(x=-12.5 y=-47.5)
Consists of a belt-group at position(x=-12.5 y=-47.5) with status EntityStatus.EMPTY.

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when using insert_item function: 
  - Ensure you have the item to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert it.
* Errors when using undefined variables: 
  - Make sure to define variables before using them.
* Errors when inserting items into a furnace: 
  - Ensure the furnace is not out of fuel before attempting to insert items.
* Errors when using burner-mining-drills: 
  - Ensure the drill has fuel before attempting to use it.
* Errors when using burner-inserter: 
  - Ensure the inserter has source items before attempting to use it.

### NAMESPACE
* Defined functions: 
  - insert_item
  - get_entities
* Important variables: 
  - Prototype.Coal (type: Prototype)
  - Prototype.IronOre (type: Prototype)
  - inserter1 (type: Entity)
  - furnace (type: Entity)
  - quantit (type: undefined)
* Failure modes: 
  - insert_item function fails when the item to insert is not in the inventory.
  - get_entities function fails when the entity does not exist.
* Success modes: 
  - insert_item function succeeds when the item to insert is in the inventory.
  - get_entities function succeeds when the entity exists.
